lines.text:
[after carrying Lee onto the couch and picking up the phone]
I need an ambulance.
NO!
[Cray hangs up]
My father made a tape of us.
The fuck you talking about? Your father made a tape of us?

[Reaches for Cray]
I'm sorry...

[Pulls away]
What, what do you want from me?
I have to leave the city.
You want some cash?
[Throws cash at her]
Where's the tape? Where's the fucking tape?
I remember you tried to explain to me once why life was different here. You said, "The difference is, down here the past isn't dead. It isn't even past."
Did I? Damn. Can sure turn a phrase, can't he?
I thought about that for a long time.
I'll drink to that.
I wanna speak openly and directly to you and I trust you'll do the same.
Son, I hope we can always.
I want the tape. That tape was made for you, and I want you to give it to me.

[pause]
You don't understand...
DON'T BULLSHIT ME! You hired a blackmailer to get a tape on me like I'm some boot lickin' ward heel, I'm your god damned family.
I wasn't gonna use it like that.
You already used it.
You know, I've been hearing this kind of barbershop trash my whole life.
